publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1004# Mr Jamie Stone: Highland Clearances—That the Parliament expresses its deepest regret for the occurrence of the Highland Clearances and extends its hand in friendship and welcome to the descendants of the cleared people who reside outwith our shores. Supported by: Mr John Munro*
S1M-1004# Highland Clearances (lodged on 13 June 2000) Mr Murray Tosh*, Christine Grahame*
S1M-1004# Highland Clearances (lodged on 13 June 2000) David Mundell*, Rhoda Grant*
